DOC.criteria: Limited exercise tolerance Rapid Assessment Physical Activity ( RAPA ) score ≤ 3 Hand grip ( dominant hand ) : men ≤ 30.3 kg , woman ≤ 19.3 kg Walk speed ≤ 0.8 m/s ( base 4 meter walk ) Subject weight > 137 kg ( 300 lb ) , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 32 kg/m2 Primary muscle disease myopathy Recent immobilization , major trauma leg within 6 month Knee hip replacement within 12 month low extremity amputation Significant laboratory abnormality Significant comorbidities medical history Weight loss ( intentional unintentional ) > 5 kg 12 week Unable complete MRI scan
